name: Code Quiz
description: The Coding Quiz Challenge contains 5 questions, on each you have 4 multiple choice options.

name: Work Day Scheduler
description: Create a simple work-day-scheduler calendar application that allows for user to enter tasks/events for that hour in the text area and save events for each hour of the day.

name: Budget Tracker
description: This application allows the user to track their withdrawals and deposits on a computer or mobile device with or without an internet connection.
